Legacy.feedback-description: Appreciation? Compliment? Criticism? You are welcome to provide feedback to the staff team via email or join the discussion on our forum!
Legacy.no-atc-online: There is currently no online ATC.
Legacy.no-pilot-online: There is currently no online pilot.
Legacy.no-future-atc: There is currently no ATC schedule.
Legacy.maintenance: This page is currently under maintenance :(

controller-list.description: The list below is displayed based on the controller data in our ATC Center. Automatic data updates may have at most 24 hours of delay. Only controllers (including visiting controller) with controlling permission on at least one type of positions will be listed. (i.e. Controllers not in the list have no controlling permission.)
controller-list.status-active: Active: This controller is active, and be able to provide service.
controller-list.status-absence: Inactive: This controller is inactive, need to be re-certified before providing service.
controller-list.marker-visiting: Visiting: This controller is a visiting controller.
controller-list.permission-restricted: Restricted: This controller is not eligible to provide service to this position.
controller-list.permission-training: In Training: This controller is eligible to provide service to this position ONLY under supervision from a mentor
controller-list.permission-solo: Solo Training: This controller is eligible to provide solo service to this position for the purpose of position familiarization and fluency training.
controller-list.permission-full: Certified: The controller is fully eligible to provide solo service to this position.
controller-list.ptwr-description: *T2: Tier 2 Permission. Training status for this permission is not displayed on this page.
controller-list.tmu-controllers: Controllers with Traffic Management Center Permission
controller-list.no-tmu: No controllers with Traffic Management Center Permission currently

cookie.text: By continuing to use this website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy.

errors.NoTranslationError: There is unfortunately no corresponding translation in your selected language.
